title: WATCH: Black Coffee takes us behind-the-scenes of his 'Daily Show' interview
text:
WATCH: Black Coffee takes us behind-the-scenes of his 'Daily Show' interview share this

Johannesburg – Sharing a short video on Twitter, Black Coffee captured his time on the Daily Show set, taking fans behind-the-scenes of his interview – from his drive to the studio, to meeting up with Trevor before the show and the moments after the conversation had wrapped.

"This is like a big moment for me," the DJ says before his appearance on the show, adding that he is not sure what they will be talking about.

After the interview ends, Black Coffee describes the experience as "nerve-wracking".

TAKE A LOOK AT HIS CLIP HERE:

In his conversation with Trevor, Black Coffee touches on his worldwide success and a new project he is working on which will see him build a school in SA.

WATCH BLACK COFFEE'S INTERVIEW ON THE DAILY SHOW BELOW:
description: Black Coffee captured his time on the Daily Show set, taking fans behind-the-scenes of his interview.
